00027 #include <Inventor/events/SoButtonEvent.h>
00028 
00029 #define SO_SPACEBALL_PRESS_EVENT(EVENT, BUTTON) \
00030  (SoSpaceballButtonEvent::isButtonPressEvent(EVENT, SoSpaceballButtonEvent::BUTTON))
00031 
00032 #define SO_SPACEBALL_RELEASE_EVENT(EVENT, BUTTON) \
00033  (SoSpaceballButtonEvent::isButtonReleaseEvent(EVENT, SoSpaceballButtonEvent::BUTTON))
00034 
00035 
00036 class COIN_DLL_API SoSpaceballButtonEvent : public SoButtonEvent {
00037   typedef SoButtonEvent inherited;
00038 
00039   SO_EVENT_HEADER();
00040 
00041 public:
00042   enum Button {
00043     ANY, BUTTON1, BUTTON2, BUTTON3, BUTTON4, BUTTON5, BUTTON6, BUTTON7,
00044     BUTTON8, PICK
00045   };
00046 
00047   SoSpaceballButtonEvent(void);
00048   virtual ~SoSpaceballButtonEvent();
00049 
00050   void setButton(SoSpaceballButtonEvent::Button button);
00051   SoSpaceballButtonEvent::Button getButton(void) const;
00052 
00053   static SbBool isButtonPressEvent(const SoEvent * e,
00054                                    SoSpaceballButtonEvent::Button whichButton);
00055   static SbBool isButtonReleaseEvent(const SoEvent * e,
00056                                      SoSpaceballButtonEvent::Button whichButton);
00057 
00058   static void initClass(void);
00059 
00060 private:
00061   Button button;
00062 };
00063
